author: Pamela Muse
text:
An Alliance member is looking for thoughts, ideas, suggestions on the delivery of CIP projects.  That is, because of reduced staffed they're having trouble keeping up with CIP obligations.  Thoughts might include contracting various services out and charging to project, etc.
Your thoughts and expertise are appreciated!
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovatin
888-468-6450
pmuse@transformgov.or
title: CIP Delivery
